definition: old property (esp. inherited from former generation)/former territory

sentences.english: Are welcome to waste materials business unit and individual calls business negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎有廢舊物資的企業單位及個人來電洽談業務。

sentences.english: Just about every piece of furniture in my house was bought from a consignment store.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎我家裏的所有的傢俱都是從舊物寄賣店買來的。

sentences.english: The warehouse stores old stuff that is no longer in use.
The garage sale pulled in more people than I had expected.
sentences.chinese: 宅前出售舊物吸引了比我期待的更多的人。

sentences.english: She says she was influenced to make baskets using waste materials.
sentences.chinese: 她說，她是用籃子的影響，使廢舊物資。

sentences.english: China abandons platform of the information on country of net of old goods and materials' biggest network.
sentences.chinese: 中國廢舊物資網國內最大的一個網上信息平臺。

sentences.english: It's where we keeps our old things.
sentences.chinese: 就是我們存放舊物的地方。

sentences.english: Large-scale enterprises have many years of experience in waste material handling mature.
sentences.chinese: 具有多年大型企業廢舊物資處理成熟經驗。

sentences.english: I stayed in my room and looked through Tom's old stuff.
sentences.chinese: 我呆在我的房間，一件一件查看湯姆的舊物。

sentences.english: Just about every piece of furniture in my house was bought from a  consignment store.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎我家裏的所有的傢俱都是從舊物寄賣店買來的。

sentences.english: And it has spawned a surprising interest in old things among all kinds of people.
sentences.chinese: 它引發人各種人對舊物的興趣。

sentences.english: Welcome to the unit and used materials and personal contact to discuss recovery issues.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎有廢舊物資的單位及個人聯繫洽談回收事宜。

to be eradicated/to vanish/extinct/to break off relations
